meta.title: Archer Exchange | Archer Technologies, LLC
meta.description: With the Archer Exchange, the Archer team and our trusted partners have created a broad selection of supplemental, value-add offerings to help you get your unique risk management program on the right path, right from the start. You can leverage the Archer Exchange offerings to expand use of Archer solutions into new business processes and address specific industry, geographic, regulatory, or technical requirements. The Archer Exchange features a fast and nimble development cycle, enabling quick delivery of new and updated offerings for trending issues and connections to innovative technologies.
meta.keywords: Archer, Exchange, add-on, app-pack, accelerator, tool, utility, content, integration, authoritative source, industry standard, questionnaire, assessment, control, control standard, policy
meta.author: Archer Exchange

items.description: The Archer Control Standards library consists of over 1,200 best-practice control standards organized through a custom GRC taxonomy developed specifically to align with multiple best-practice external standards and benchmarks.
items.overview: The Archer Control Standards library consists of over 1,200 best-practice control standards organized through a custom GRC taxonomy developed specifically to align with multiple best-practice external standards and benchmarks.
items.name: Archer Control Standards

items.description: Simplify your SIG questionnaire process with the Shared Assessments Standard Information Gathering Template (SIG) Questionnaire to compile information and determine how you are managing risks within a service provider's environment in one location.
items.overview: Simplify your SIG questionnaire process with the Shared Assessments Standard Information Gathering Template (SIG) Questionnaire to compile information and determine how you are managing risks within a service provider's environment in one location.
items.name: Shared Assessments SIG Template Questionnaire

items.description: Effortlessly streamline file downloads. The Archer ZIP Management Tool & Utility is designed to help Archer users easily download multiple files. This offering uses a custom object to create a ZIP file and automatically downloads all files present within specific attachment fields on the record or across specified cross-references.
items.overview: Effortlessly streamline file downloads. The Archer ZIP Management Tool & Utility is designed to help Archer users easily download multiple files. This offering uses a custom object to create a ZIP file and automatically downloads all files present within specific attachment fields on the record or across specified cross-references.
items.name: Archer ZIP Management

items.description: Archer ESG Score Connect, powered by CSRHub, provides insights into vendors' ESG third-party performance, highlights potential ESG risks, and allows organizations to perform peer benchmarking.
items.overview: Archer ESG Score Connect, powered by CSRHub, provides insights into vendors' ESG third-party performance, highlights potential ESG risks, and allows organizations to perform peer benchmarking.
items.name: Archer ESG Score Connect
items.blurb: Mitigate ESG risks with insight into your third-party ESG scores

items.description: With the Archer NIST-Aligned AI Risk Management Framework app-pack, you can utilize the NIST AI Risk Management Framework to assess your AI implementations to determine the posture of your current AI implementation through a comprehensive risk assessment.  This offering helps organizations design and implement effective risk mitigation strategies to address the gaps from the current implementation to the target implementation.
items.overview: With the Archer NIST-Aligned AI Risk Management Framework app-pack, you can utilize the NIST AI Risk Management Framework to assess your AI implementations to determine the posture of your current AI implementation through a comprehensive risk assessment.  This offering helps organizations design and implement effective risk mitigation strategies to address the gaps from the current implementation to the target implementation.
items.name: Archer NIST-Aligned AI Risk Management Framework
items.blurb: Identify and manage artificial intelligence risks

items.description: RiskRecon enables organizations to control risk by providing independent monitoring of your own enterprise's external security posture, known as Own Enterprise Monitoring.
items.overview: RiskRecon enables organizations to control risk by providing independent monitoring of your own enterprise's external security posture, known as Own Enterprise Monitoring.
items.name: RiskRecon Own Enterprise Monitoring
items.blurb: Cybersecurity ratings to assess your organization's risk

items.description: RiskRecon enables you to control third-party risk by providing vendor security assessments that are comprehensive, actionable and available on demand. We can evaluate the security program of any organization -- SaaS, outsourcer or an in-house provider. With RiskRecon, you will obtain a verifiable assessment of each third-party’s security practices. You can then establish a base level of trust and identify specific areas for further discussion and investigation.
items.overview: RiskRecon enables you to control third-party risk by providing vendor security assessments that are comprehensive, actionable and available on demand. We can evaluate the security program of any organization -- SaaS, outsourcer or an in-house provider.
items.name: RiskRecon Third Party Security Risk Monitoring
items.blurb: Cybersecurity ratings to assess your vendor's risk

items.description:
CastleHill Software provides integration and analysis tools to enhance and facilitate your Archer workload. CastleHill Software products are based on decades of hands-on experience with the Archer platform, .NET development, and complex integration implementations. 
Integrating external resources with Archer requires an intimate understanding of the internal mechanics of Archer’s authentication methods and components. Estrelica.Core hides all of that complexity and the need for advanced knowledge. Estrelica.Core amplifies a .NET developer’s ability to quickly create applications that interact with Archer while observing the Archer permissions model.
items.overview:
CastleHill Software's Estrelica.Core accelerates the development of Archer integration applications, putting the world of Archer record content, platform metadata, and more at your fingertips. For those with .NET skills and a basic understanding of the Archer platform, Estrelica.Core simplifies the use of Archer APIs while improving performance, error handling, as well as introducing shortcuts for common tasks.

Estrelica.Core makes every .NET developer on your team an Archer integration expert overnight, with no prior Archer API experience required. As a .NET Standard 2.0 library, Estrelica.Core allows your team to quickly develop Archer integration applications in all recent versions of .NET or .NET Core and deploy them to any supported platform (Windows, Linux, Mac, etc.).
items.name: CastleHill Software Estrelica.Core .NET Integration Library

items.description: Compliance.ai’s mission is to transform the way highly regulated organizations address compliance risk, and to modernize compliance processes for both the regulators and the regulated entities. Compliance.ai empowers financial compliance teams to proactively manage the growing volume and velocity of regulatory changes, as they occur, and make it simple to implement the appropriate steps to remain in compliance.
items.overview: Compliance.ai’s mission is to transform the way highly regulated organizations address compliance risk, and to modernize compliance processes for both the regulators and the regulated entities. Compliance.ai empowers financial compliance teams to proactively manage the growing volume and velocity of regulatory changes, as they occur, and make it simple to implement the appropriate steps to remain in compliance.
items.name: Compliance.ai Service Connector

items.description: With the Microsoft 365 OneDrive and SharePoint integration, Archer users will be provided an option to navigate to their OneDrive or SharePoint and select one or more files to associate to the record via an enhanced External Links field.  Once a file is added to the Archer record, Archer users will be provided a link in which they can view the embedded document within the record or edit the document in a separate window using OneDrive or SharePoint.
items.overview: In the modern business world, organizations use various software for storing files and collaboration. Many organizations use Microsoft® 365 OneDrive or SharePoint which is a cloud storage offering with file sharing and editing capabilities and much more. The Microsoft 365 OneDrive and SharePoint integration with Archer allows users to easily reference and interact with files stored on OneDrive or SharePoint within Archer.
items.name: Microsoft 365 OneDrive and SharePoint

items.description: The Archer Policy Library includes a set of 19 best-practice policies developed by Archer.
items.overview: The Archer Policy Library includes a set of 19 best-practice policies developed by Archer.
items.name: Archer Policy Library
items.blurb: Best practice statements of management expectations

items.description: The ISO/IEC 27001 standard provides companies of any size and from all sectors of activity with guidance for establishing, implementing, maintaining and continually improving an information security management system.
items.overview: The ISO/IEC 27001 standard provides companies of any size and from all sectors of activity with guidance for establishing, implementing, maintaining and continually improving an information security management system.
items.name: ISO/IEC 27001 Standard Authoritative Source
